website_summaries.verdict: Tons of color options for all-day wear lipstick that doesn't need to be reapplied.
pros: Choose between matte, satin, or shimmer finish
Combination of instant hydration and all day wear
Enriched with natural hydrators like avocado oil and vitamin E. Will not bleed or rub off
Free of synthetic dyes and GMO free
cons: Customers found the applicator blush too long and awkward to use

customer_reviews.title: YAY  the Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to lie, I bought this because this is the lipstick that the lovely and amazing Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez wears! It does what it says...it stays on all day and it doesn't come off. Because of this, it's imperative to get it exactly right when you put it on which isn't easy because its very gloppy right out of the tube. Any mistakes will be there all day (a lip liner might help). Once its on, it looks great but is definitely matte. A layer of lip balm makes it shiny. Recommened.
customer_reviews.author: LaLaB.

customer_reviews.title: By far the best lipstick on earth!
customer_reviews.text: Today is my first day wearing this product and I have to give it a full 5 stars! I first put it on at 5am (and he's exaxtly at 5am) this morning before coming to work and I have yet to reapply 7 hours later. I ate breakfast AND lunch with a coffee and two waters today and yes it has faded but BARELY. I have never had a lipstick last as long and beautifully as STILLA stay all day! Will definitely be buying again! The first photo is from this morning at 5AM when i first applied and the second photo was right after I had lunch at noon.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Brasher

customer_reviews.title: My best ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick. I work in an environment where I cannot afford to keep reapplying my lips every hour or so. This stays put all day and compliments my reflection well. My 3rd purchase and I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mgiriama

customer_reviews.title: so I kind of knew what it would look like. I am pretty fair skinned and I think ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the Patina - a little darker than I thought it would be, but maybe I shouldn't buy makeup online! I watched a lot of youtube videos, so I kind of knew what it would look like. I am pretty fair skinned and I think this looks nice without being over the top. It lasts through a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I bought Aria and Patina (picture) and they are beautiful colors. They dry a little darker than the bottle though so that was kind of weird. I didn't need to reapply though and it wasn't terribly drying...I could actually barely feel it on my lips!
customer_reviews.author: Kkbday

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: This liquid lipstick is a very cute color and goes on fine. I made sure it to put too many layers on or it does not dry fast enough and smears. Also, it lasts a decent time like 4-5 hours without a touchup if you put a thin layer on. It is very pigmented too so no worries about that. One other negative is a lot of product goes on the applicator when applying so I usually have to try to scrape some off before I apply it so o don't get too much on. Otherwise great product!
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie S.

customer_reviews.title: Very matte
customer_reviews.text: This is a great color. I find applying with a wand to be a bit tricky to get the lines just right, so I don't love the applicator. It's very very matte and not at all moisturizing -- and applying anything like chapstick to moisturize your lips will dissolve the color. Once applied, make sure you wait until it's totally dry so you don't smudge it-- but after that, it's bomb-proof. I can put it on in the morning before work and when I get home after dinner that night, it will still be there! Very long lasting and great if you like the dry/matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!! Red lips forever!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I put this on and I showered right after to see if I’d have it on after my shower. When I came out of the shower it was like I’d just applied it. I touched my lips with my finger and nothing came off. Then I wiped my face with the towel and nothing came off. I found a winner! I love the color of red also. I did not reapply all day and I went to sleep with it and in the morning it was still there! My lips were still red! I only bought this bc this is the one AOC wears and she recommended it. Thank you AOC!
customer_reviews.author: SandraG

customer_reviews.title: Homerun
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting, beautiful color. This is Patina color. I bought two others as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Color not as expected...disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in the color Fia and expected it to have more brown in it based on the color sample. I know colors can vary but this was a pure nude tone and looked like I had not put anything on. Basically it looked colorless. I cant say if it stayed on because I couldn't see it but my lips didn't fell dry or tacky as some extended wear lipstick does. So unfortunately back it goes! Will try colors at Ulta before purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Come on maaaan
customer_reviews.text: The thought definitely crossed my mind that buying makeup on Amazon seemed a little crazy to begin with, but I thought “oh what the heck?” and went ahead and did it anyway. Sad to say, I wish I would have listened to initial hesistation. I love this color. I love it even more when it stays on my lips and doesn’t flake off after 30 minutes. Formula is incredibly dry... goes on beautifully... but once it starts to oxidize...say goodbye :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning: The color Palermo is MUCH darker that the tube looks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the color Palermo and still do not understand how it looks so much lighter in the tube than on your face. The tube just the same or lighter than 3 other brands I have but it is a deep almost burgundy color. The listing has woman wearing the colors, and I would highly recommend using those as the guide to what color to buy. Beautiful coverage when applied, but when it moves it gets everywhere! I would recommend this if you wear matte lipstick with no gloss or moisturizer over it. But if you like to add a clear gloss over your color, this can get all over your face.
customer_reviews.author: Lockness

customer_reviews.title: Bacca is Raspberry Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Bacca is the second Stila purchase I’ve made. I am in LOVE with this lipstick. It is a true matte and wears all day. It is not smudge proof, but even after a work day of drinking water and breakfast and lunch it still looks great. I wasn’t sure about Bacca because the color online wasn’t the Raspberry I was hunting for. I decided to google pics of Bacca reviews and saw that the color was not accurate and decided to try it. It is a true raspberry. I use only one light coat and blot well. I also use a liner which is a must with a matte lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: FoxMom6

customer_reviews.title: Patina is yucky and looks nothing like the photo!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time trying this lipstick and I selected Patina as it had the most favorable reviews and the photos other customers posted looked attractive. Patina is supposed to be a dusty rose color but this shade looks dark grey with some purple on me which is nothing how it looks on the website. It looks ugly and gross! The lipstick has staying power and isn't too drying, but I don't want to look like a corpse all day. I'm very disappointed in the Patina color, but will consider trying another color in the future due to the staying power of the formula.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonie

customer_reviews.title: Yessssss!
customer_reviews.text: For those of you that are familiar with Stila and this specific lip product, it’s meant to be matted and dry. I love this product, stays on all day! I was super upset when Sephora stopped selling it. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Haydee

customer_reviews.title: MESSY MESSY MESSY MESSY
customer_reviews.text: What a freaking train wreck.. this stuff migrates, I even found some near my ear today. It's like it NEVER sets and it spreads. Everytime I try to use this product, it ends up on my hands, on my face, on my clothes, it has a mind of its own. HORRIBLE, will NOT buy again ....
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Baertsch

customer_reviews.title: Color choices
customer_reviews.text: My review is about the colors. The colors are either very bright, like very red and neon pink and the neutral colors like mauve and pink have a purple hue that makes it look ghoulish. There are no pretty and pink or mauve colors, it's either very bright, very dark, or a ghoulish-looking purplish-beige hue with the light colored lipsticks.
customer_reviews.author: ChinkyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly NOT smudge proof or long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick was greatly disappointing. The color is beautiful and vibrant, while the feel and texture on the lips is lightweight and satiny. Goes on smoothly and doesn't feel dry like other long lasting lipsticks. If this was supposed to be a regular lipstick I would love it. It's advertised as smudge proof and long lasting, and for a lipstick that's $22 it delivered none of this. All 5 times I have worn this lipstick, it has easily smudged, from minutes after application to a couple hours later. Drink and food wipes it off, even brushing against any surface causes smudging, and it doesn't fully last beyond a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lvr

customer_reviews.title: Finally GOT IT RIGHT be careful choosing your Patina
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these this was my third specified Patina it’s my favorite always sold out at Sephora goes well day or night delicate and can make it darker onl need very little but one was a shimmer and one was a sheer be careful. I do know the difference! This is one of the prettiest everyday wears and one tube was opened and looked used. Or half dried up? I recently purchased a Stila from Sephora when opened there should be way too much lipstick on the wand. This other one I returned had nothing had to dig for it
customer_reviews.author: RAINASADDICTEDTOAMAZON

customer_reviews.title: Stays on for a long time even after a meal
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick quality. The best part was it survived my lunch of sandwich and soup - mind you it was not the same but it covered me for pretty much whole day at work. Although later I found that it did not good when I had pizza(too greasy?). And of course the color is great-
customer_reviews.author: Suchita

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT stay on as reviews, and descriptions promise it will. VERY  DISAPPOINTING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Stilla does NOT STAY ON ALL DAY!! I have been searching for YEARS for a lip color that does..and STILLA got high reviews..so I ordered one. It didn,t even stay on for 5 minutes! Seriously $22 is ALOT to pay for a lip color..but I WOULD have bought more, if it had only stayed. One GOOD THING: The COLOR was PERFECT! It looked exactly like the color chart. I am SOOO disappointed. I have searched for years for a lip color that stays on...I don,t think there IS one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It definitely stays in place
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I used up the whole tube now so I feel like I can really comment on it. I don't think it lasts all day. At best, you've got eight hours before it starts crumbling away. As long as you're careful with water and food, you should be fine but it does come off with eating and drinking. It has a pleasant smell to it and you don't need much when applying. It mattes down very quickly, which I also like, and is very forgiving when you mess up or want to get it off. I'd recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: The colors are fantastic, this is like a gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this lipstick. Once you let it dry, i's boyfriends proof, and, most importantly, burrito proof. The colors are fantastic, this is like a gorgeous, deep purple with a burgundy undertone-perfect for fall and winter! The staying power is amazing and it really does stay all day without needing to reapply, and without drying out your lips!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, but comes off if you eat.
customer_reviews.text: The color goes on smoothly and it is a lovely color. I bought it because it is supposed to be extended wear, but unfortunately, after putting it on, I went to get lunch (this was pre-Covid...just catching up on reviews now) and half of it came off right away. That was a bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Kardos

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lipstick with Healthy Ingredients!!
customer_reviews.text: So you love lipstick like I do? It is the one cosmetic I cannot do without! But....the chemicals....I was concerned. Then I found this lipstick....OMG...it is lovely! I am going to throw out all my others....I got the bright red and orange-ish colors....2 tubes. I really recommend these to everyone...I am a Certified Health Coach and so chemicals on my lips are of great concern, but I still love my lipstick and want beautiful color that lasts...THIS ONE FITS THE BILL!!!! I highly recommend to you....Enjoy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S.A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, long wearing formula
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this lipstick. Now, moisturizing it is not, it is a full on liquid lipstick, but it sits very well on the lips and does not emphasize lines or cling to flakes. The color fiery is gorgeous and makes my teeth look whiter. It lasts a long time, and it's incredibly smudge proof. I ran out of mine, and immediately reordered, that is how much I love this!
customer_reviews.author: blerch

customer_reviews.title: Not a true patina color.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite lipstick ever! I have small children who wants kisses all day and I don’t have to worry about smudging lipstick on them. However, the patina color I ordered was more purple than it should be. I like the true patina color, this purple one, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: foxysmith

customer_reviews.title: Patina
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, however I seen in a lot of reviews people say how it stays all day, days through drink and eating and I did not experience that. At all. I will say that for a Matt it is very creamy it does not dry out your lips it does not kiss off but it does not stay on after drinking and eating. I would say it's a little overpriced not worth sending back but the color is rich and feels good on the lips.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Price

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lip color/ texture/ wear- Patina
customer_reviews.text: Received a sample of this in “Patina” in a Birch Box or Ipsy, I can’t remember. It’s been in my pocket since I got it a couple of months ago. The most perfect color of nude. Lasts all day, it’s crazy. So I bought this one- the full sized version and carry around the sample sized one as well. I might buy one for the car too.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Lasts ALL day!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ultimate power pout that lasts ALL through my 8-9 hour work day withput the need for touch up! Upon applying, the wand does tend to carry a lot of product, which is why some may find it easier to use a lip brush when applying but it's still feasible with the wand alone. You definitely need a steady hand to apply this product. It's super vibrant and pigmented so mistakes will be noticeable and slightly difficult to fix. You have to work semi quick with this product as well.
customer_reviews.author: Meh

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to color and lipstick. I've tried many different "stay on" and "matte" lipsticks but they dried out my lips. This goes on smoothly, and just looks perfect. And no, it does NOT stay on all day (at least not if you eat and drink and live...) but it stays on for hours without problems. Removing it is also not a problem. My only complaint, I seem to run through them too quickly...
customer_reviews.author: Elke

customer_reviews.title: NOT DRY
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lip stain that stays on while you eat and drink thru the evening. This lipstick goes on well - does not feel dry like others. However, it does not stay on for long. Definitely not as long as it says it will if you are eating and drinking. It does not stain your cups. I like it but it is still not what I am looking for but until I find it I will use it. The colors are difficult to find the right ones. The colors on the picture are not what they are when you put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Isn't the real thing--but I missed return window
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I just missed the return window. I liked this color on my daughter, so ordered it. I was surprised at how runny it was--got all over my teeth no matter how careful I was. Plus, despite the description, it came off easily on cups, glasses, napkins (did I mention my teeth?) Finally had the chance to show it to my daughter and she said there's something wrong because the consistency of mine was totally different than hers (bought at Sephora). I think this is some kind of fake, and wish I'd realized that one day earlier so I could have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Bprinsen

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this bold color and it does last a long time. It comes on super wet and then you sort of need to let it set/stain the lips and then you are good to go. If you make any mistake in application you need to remove the part in error immediately. I also use make-up wipes to remove and it comes off super easy. Does dry the lips out a bit, but I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Watch the age on these
customer_reviews.text: Order first one and it was over 2 years old. Ordered a replacement and the same thing. Code on the first tube was 417B. Second one was 417C. These lipsticks were made in 2017. Well over the 2 year best used time period. Returning both. Bought somewhere else with a better date.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Why is it so hard to buy lipstick?
customer_reviews.text: The color Patina looked nice in everyone's photos, a rosy plum, but on me it looked a chalky purple and drained my face of color and life. (I'm dark haired, fair skinned, slightly olive in tone.) It's also hard to apply this kind of liquid lipstick precisely. And without balm on top, lips look dry. But applying balm on top tends to make the color weep.
customer_reviews.author: KJeg

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: I have spent so much money looking for a lipstick that remains on the lips, stays on all day, no smudges or stains. I used this product about 4 times and it DOES NOT REMAIN ON THE LIPS. Within an hour or so, the lipstick has rubbed off. I’ll go back to using what I have used for years. They have the best, however my favorite color seems to be sold out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lipstick. New favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lipstick. It definitely doesn't feel like anything on my lips - especially if you apply chapstick beforehand. It isn't 100% transfer proof (very small amount comes off on straws/coffee mugs) HOWEVER this doesn't really negatively impact the staying power, and I found I can go almost a full 8hr work day before applying a second coat, because while it does fade some, it fades in a very natural way. It also smells and feels lovely on the skin, almost buttery? It goes on lighter than it dries also, maybe darkening a shade or two in the process, so don't be alarmed if it seems too light at first. I've got the shade Patina. Just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Matthias

customer_reviews.title: Even the color on the box is not as dull as the actual product It makes your lips invisible
customer_reviews.text: I have many stila products, but this one is not what I'd hoped for. It is not the color it appears to be. Even the color on the box is not as dull as the actual product It makes your lips invisible. It also seems like it is dried up a bit. It's not as full as my other stila lip products are. Hate to say it but I am going to have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this color on my sister and right away asked what it was and bought it. The color is very rich and compliments fair skinned people. The color lasts all day and is not drying at all. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lipstick.
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much. It is creamy, rich, smooth, easy to apply, smells great, stays on most of the day (much better than Kylie's lip kits), and is just so nice. It feels luxurious. I love this color, too. Best all day matte liquid lipstick formula I have found thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Erika

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Seller
customer_reviews.text: The Seller is excellent and appears to be a wonderful, happy, professional and attentive entrepreneur. The product applied easily but for my blonde hair, blue eyed and extremely fair complexion, this color (BACI) went on really muddy looking. Not a fan of this color. The brand is excellent and other colors are awesome too. This color just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting.Money wasted
customer_reviews.text: I like the mat look but not last long as they mentioned. I am using a dif brand which lasts all day long even I eat ,drink. I bought this one because it says all day.But it won't last long and it will go all over on your face after drinking Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: It's Very Pretty & Does Last Awhile
customer_reviews.text: The color is my favorite. This is the 4th tube I have purchased and will continue to do so. You do have to be careful as it goes on pretty softly, so it can travel over your lip before it dries. I guess you always have to dab it after applying.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the extra money—not long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Beso because AOC looks so great in it. It is a very pretty red, but underperforms Revlon Liquid Lipstick (“Top Tomato”) and my fave Maybelline Superstay Matte Ink (I like “Ruler” the best but it’s a very blue red). This didn’t stay on through my first cup of coffee (Matte Ink stays on through lunch and sometimes dinner, depending on the meal). It may be more moisturizing-didn’t stay on long enough for me to tell.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. R

customer_reviews.title: Don't know why I keep trying 'stay on' lipsticks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Caramello, which does not compliment my skin tone. It's too beige/brown. The downfall to ordering new makeup on line. Anyway, the lipstick goes on smoothly. Not too thick or thin. You cannot make a mistake, so go slowly and follow your lip line while applying. It accentuates every little wrinkle in your lips. It appears dry and cracked. I tried Clinique Clear Pep-Start lip balm to help, but that only made this product come off in a nasty way. Guess I'll stick with regular lipstick or try a stain.
customer_reviews.author: squidney

customer_reviews.title: Adore! A true red
customer_reviews.text: Wowza! This red pops. I’ve been searching for the right red for my complexion and kept running into shades that had too much orange or too much purple. This one hits the bullseye. I was surprised by its longevity and yet how easy it was to remove at the end of the day as opposed to other companies I’ve purchased, which demanded heavy duty removal due to residue lip staining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all day lip wear
customer_reviews.text: I am a HUGE stila fan! And their matte formula is perfection! No smudges, long lasting, does not require reapplication unless your eating or drinking and that is literally only for the inside of your lips!! 100% satisfaction!!
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Authentic .10oz Stila!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lipstick! Originally got a mini in my Birchbox and found the .10 oz on Amazon at a great price, bought it in Portofino and Perla. Authentic Stila brand, goes on smooth and long lasting, will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Breanne

customer_reviews.title: Beso=True Red?  Not quite.
customer_reviews.text: I bought beso, or true red for my wife. She really likes it's and it looks great on her. She had a bit of a problem with the outline, however a lip liner helps. I would give it 5 stars because it looks extremely sexy on her, but the color seems slightly off from true red. The color is very bright and there's a slight hint of orangein the color. Looks great, but not true red.
customer_reviews.author: MATT

customer_reviews.title: NOT ALL DAY AND SPLOTCHY DOESNT APPLY WELL
customer_reviews.text: I only buy all day lipsticks so I was looking to try new brands because my cover girl outlast doesn't offer a lot of colors. This is spot hype, doesnt go on well and does not stay on more than an hour and even less if you eat or drink. Def not worth the money!!!! I'll go back to outlast and Maybelline Superstay.
customer_reviews.author: michael & mistie jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product at all. Darker than the image here has more wine to it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great color, but darker than expected. Overall a great color but does not last too long - esp, if you drink or eat. Of all the lip stains I have, the LipInk and Mehru seem to last the longest. Esp, LipInk, but the downside is that with LipInk you need to be very careful applying, else takes a while correcting smudges and errors. The Stila allows room for error and I love that it is very smooth, love that it is vegan, and love that there is no waxy taste or smell to this. Will buy a couple more colors despite my small grievances.
customer_reviews.author: Dog is my co-pilot

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Dolce Vita color is awful
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this lip stain is excellent, but do not order the color Dolce Vita. The color is awful and doesn’t reflect what it shows on the photo. In person, it reminds me of the actors in the movie Titanic when they freeze to death in the water as the lifeboats are trying to recover bodies. It’s a very bad color. Patina is a beautiful natural pink.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and beautiful coverage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to take a photo with my family next to the pool. It was so easy to apply I did it with my phone camera and it went on smoothly and with great coverage. It also allowed me to do touch ups without messing up the previously applied product. My lips looked great in the photos. I would definitely purchase this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Jay M

customer_reviews.title: A basic everyday lip color that has nice staying power
customer_reviews.text: I apply this lipstick in the morning and after lunch to get me thru the day. It takes some effort to get it all removed before bedtime. Stila is a very good brand and is more moisturizing than the cheaper drug store labels. I think that's why it may not last as long as those other brands but it makes my lips feel better during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Klyber

customer_reviews.title: Blotchy
customer_reviews.text: It should up 3 days late, and I was extremely disappointed in the product. I use Stila lip stay all of the time. I have 4 different shades. This one that I received comes out blotchy! It also appears to bleed off my lips. Not cute. Now I know why it was on sale. However fiery, bocca, Tesoro are amazing shades though
customer_reviews.author: angelle

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and matte finish!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and long lasting lip stain. It’s by far one of the best matte lip stains. It does not come off easily and looks amazing. The price was also hard to beat when compared to retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: DELIA

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price due to wear and smudge
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I got this on sale, I'd have been very upset if I had paid full price. I love the color, and it applies really well, but it does NOT last. The middle of my mouth wore off so quickly and the edges smudged. It also transferred easily. I get better wear out of my Maybelline that costs about of this product.
customer_reviews.author: SarPar

customer_reviews.title: Nice but color is off
customer_reviews.text: Okay. I look dead. Either that or I need some oxygen. Patina comes out way darker and way more purple than it looks. :/
customer_reviews.author: elefunmomma

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing product. I am in love. I'm very picky with my lipstick, but this one stays so long and yet is moisturizing...is it some kind of magic? I've tried Jeffree Star too, and honestly this brand is slightly better. It stays longer and the pigment quality is unreal. The only thing I would warn you about is that it's hard to control (you have to be confident in your makeup skills), but that's not a fault of the product. That's just the nature of liquid lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brand and shade
customer_reviews.text: This is the only lipstick brand I've found that lasts a long time and that when applied stays on until I want to take it off. Also this is the only shade of red that I like to apply to my lips, it's a constant staple in my makeup bag and I hope ill always be able to purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't over do it.
customer_reviews.text: The most durable, pigmented long lasting lipstick I own. One I can wear and kiss my boyfriend without ANY transfer. Once it has dried fully of course. Just don't over coat it or it'll crack and won't dry proper, one layer is enough. It also smells good :)
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color but dries out lips
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an everyday long lasting lipstick and this delivered - to a point. The color does come off a little on glasses, or when eating. So I had to reapply in those instances. The color patina was really pretty, but after a few weeks of use, the lip color dried out my lips substantially and I am still recovering weeks later after discontinuing use. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Mel S

customer_reviews.title: It really does stay all day!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic lipstick. I usually don't wear lipstick because it's gone after your first mug of tea. But this stuff stays and stays, as long as you don't eat something big like a giant sandwich. I've found that when I wash my skin at night, lipstick still comes off on the toner sheets I use. Proof that most of it really did last all day. I've also gotten compliments on the color.
customer_reviews.author: L. Blumenthal

customer_reviews.title: ... can't even begin to tell you how much I love the stila all day liquid lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I can't even begin to tell you how much I love the stila all day liquid lipstick. I have had 2 tubes of different shades of red, because red lipstick is the hardest to keep on, and people always ask me how I can go all night looking like I have constantly reapplied my lipstick, but they've never seen me actually reapply lipstick! And I share the stila gospel. I decided to get a daytime color, and I love this one just as much. Perfect for the office or any other daytime occasion.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Lasting Color
customer_reviews.text: It only takes a little of this product to last all day long. Can be a little drying so I too with lip balm and then I'm set. Love not having to reapply. The color can be a little dark, so a dab will do ya. This brand has a lot of fun colors to get you through the seasons.
customer_reviews.author: ddenney

customer_reviews.title: Patina for the win!
customer_reviews.text: This color is so perfect for every season, every outfit, everything. I LOVE IT. And Stila's formula is so creamy and easy to apply. Plus, it doesn't dry out my lips, and stays on most of the day. I'm in love with this color and this formula.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli | Blush and Brews

customer_reviews.title: Best liquid lipstick
customer_reviews.text: First, don't trust the color swatches on the listing here on Amazon. Google the color. Shades are darker than what they seem in the tube, yes. The formula glides on smooth and lasts my whole day. Stays matte, no shine. Just like I like. If you are not used to matte formulas, they might be surprisingly dry to you. You'll get used to it... these are too good.
customer_reviews.author: John Stringer

customer_reviews.title: really pretty lip color
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite lip glosses! It really lasts all day with minor touch ups- the matte effect can be a little drying, but you can apply some chapstick over top with your finger and it doesn’t impact the look. I would get every color if it wasn’t so expensive, but for the quality it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren DesJardins

customer_reviews.title: Hot AF
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over a year ago for a Wonder Woman cosplay after learning that AOC wore red Stila lipstick on her campaign, and now I totally understand why. It's a beautiful, vivid color, applies easy, and is long-lasting. After 14+ months I'm noticing that it gets crumbly before the end of the day. I get so many compliments when I wear it that I'm absolutely getting it again!
customer_reviews.author: idekyo

customer_reviews.title: Nice liquid lipstick...color doesn’t last all day for me
customer_reviews.text: This product, I had been told at Ulta, is a top-seller, and the favorite long-wear brand of my store assiciste’s. I really like it, and love the color. The color does not last all day for me, though..... Maybe it would for others.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix K

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love itt! I bought the red in fierce. It looks a lot darker once it dries but its a beautiful red, similar to MACs russian red. I've been wearing it for 7hrs now, I had a full meal with it on and it's lasted throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crumbly and runny
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this all day but I had to reapply it to my lips multiple times. By wearing it I mean its on my hands, legs, nose, chin, sleeves, dress, everything I touch. After 2 hours it turned into red crumbs falling down my chin, leaving streaks. The best part is it's really easy to wipe the streaks off of your face with a clean napkin. No stains, but it did smear everywhere so I had to use the napkin like 40 times. I ate and my corners dripped down and made me look like a sad clown. Its creeping its way between my teeth as I write this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Chrisman

customer_reviews.title: Stays on!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lipstick. Baci is my go to color. My daughter and I are both wearing it in the picture. It can feel a little dry but I just apply chapstick over it if it bothers me.
customer_reviews.author: Taramarc Inc

customer_reviews.title: Longevity not as promoted
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this product I never expected to be so disappointed. The color is absolutely Beautiful, But the longevity is not very good for the price. I was so embarrassed when I was in public at a grocery store with my face or bottom lip with splattered RED RED lipstick on it.
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The lipstick does not even last for few hours. I was so disappointed with this product. I would not recommend it at all .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Applied occasionally
customer_reviews.text: One of my friends introduced me to this lip stick. I tried hers on and I LOVED it, she got hers from Ulta it lasted me all night I this product did not need to be applied again ( even after eating and drinking). I then decided to order mine off Amazon when I got it it seemed different and it did not last me all day. It had to be applied several times and it started to flake. I ended up just taking it off completely since it was already starting to come off. I might try the one that Ulta has to see if that is different.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Burke

customer_reviews.title: Stays Put! Everlasting.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t wear lipstick. I got a sample tho and I liked it so I bought the full size product. It’s the last thing I put on my face, then I spray a nyc fixer spray all over my face. It doesn’t budge all day.
customer_reviews.author: S. GarrettTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The Color We've All Been Searching For
customer_reviews.text: Stila Stay All Day Liquid Lipstick in Patina is the color we have all been searching for. It is a perfect dusty rose that can be applied with a light hand for a touch of color or with a heavier hand for a dramatic pop! I exfoliated, moisturized and primed my lips prior to application and the result was TEN HOURS of continuous wear. It lasted throughout my entire shift at work, through multiple cups of coffee and a serious case of the munchies. I cannot recommend this product highly enough and have already placed an order for several more shades.
customer_reviews.author: N Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: A ton of product would sludge out anytime I tried to open. It doesn’t last or wear well long. Dries out on lips
customer_reviews.author: cierra

customer_reviews.title: Daily lipstick-staple of my purse!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite daily lipstick. This is actually my second purchase. My girlfriend loved it so much that I bought this as a gift to her. I must warn you tho, if you have a fair skin, this could look darker and if you have a darker skin this could look lighter. This lipstick looks completely different on my girlfriend. And, I think it is fine, because we both can wear it at the same time and not look like twins lol
customer_reviews.author: Sara M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wear!
customer_reviews.text: This really does last all day! I got a good 6 hours of wear out of it and the only reason it came off at that point was because I ate a very oily pasta dish. I have dry lips and this is one of the few longwear lip products that doesn't make them uncomfortably dry. I was also able to dab on a bit of lip balm over the lipstick once in awhile to keep my lips hydrated without the color coming off. The shade 'Amore' is a deep matte berry/brown shade that looks awesome on my fair, cool toned skin. I like that it is a darker shade that isn't too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color!! I absolutely love this formula and I especially love this color, Dolce. Natural looking because the product seems to melt into my lips rather than sitting on top of my lips. Surprisingly, this “matte” lipstick is not drying. My skin color is a light beige in winter and a more tan beige in summer.
customer_reviews.author: TRT

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: I live the color, it's very rich and smooth. It comes a little bit under the face mask but I figured out that I have to let it dry for couple minutes before I cover my face with the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Dia

customer_reviews.title: Patina is stunning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lipstick in the Patina shade, and it is a lovely mauve color. The lippy is deeply pigmented- not a subtle gloss or tint. Stays on forever and doesn't rub off easily. It feels ever so slightly dry (all day lipcolor tends to), but does not make my lips look dried out, so A+.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice matte lip
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Stila All Day liquid lipstick. I love the color, it’s a nice berry. As with the other one this is nice and matte but fairly dry. Best to moisturize before wearing and put on as thin a layer as you can. Waterproof and smudge proof is pretty on par with matte long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Jayhawk lady.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Red
customer_reviews.text: I JUST received the package, soooo excited! I absolutely live this red. The longevity is perfect for these long work days. Being smudge proof is a big plus and we all appreciate that!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Yoo

customer_reviews.title: not as strong color as should be
customer_reviews.text: I bought perla, which is a darker purple than i expected - my main issue, however, is that the pigment isn't quite as solid as I'd like and it stays liquid for a long time (danger for transfer)
customer_reviews.author: Charity June

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: You need to apply this with a light touch, be sure to check that none is on your teeth. The color will stay, but its a good idea to apply lip gloss frequently throughout the day. I like knowing that my lips have some color when I'm working, out in public, as normal lipsticks seem to disappear in an hour or two.
customer_reviews.author: Beryl Atchison

customer_reviews.title: Color VERY pale and product dries out lips
customer_reviews.text: The color was so pale it added zero color to my lips, and so drying that you could see every tiny wrinkle. My lips felt chapped and when I tried to put a moisturizer on top to take away the dryness, the product came off. Revlon and Cover Girl drug store brands make a much better long wearing lip color.
customer_reviews.author: Dee2

customer_reviews.title: Great staying power
customer_reviews.text: Great staying power! Love this product. It is NOT drying at all. Finish is matte which I like but you could easily add some shine with a favorite gloss but the gloss will change the performance of the lip stain.
customer_reviews.author: missmelissa

customer_reviews.title: Great product! You only have to apply it twice ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! You only have to apply it twice and that's if you plan to be out all day and night. It doesn't crack, cake or crumble up which is a huge plus for me because I have big lips. Even when you reapply it, it goes on smooth and velvety. I have numerous colors of this lipstick, and it is by far my favorite. I hate that Sephora stopped carrying it in the actual stores, but thank God for Amazon Prime!
customer_reviews.author: K.Gip

customer_reviews.title: Best lip stain color!
customer_reviews.text: This is my all-time favorite lip stain and color. Patina is a soft dusty rose color and it stays on all day long. Do not reapply or it will cake up. You have to remove it with oil, clean your lips well, prep with a tiny bit of balm, THEN reapply. I get compliments on the color all the time. My hair is almost black, my skin is a medium beige, and my eyes are dark brown. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Liz S.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I will from now on only order make ...
customer_reviews.text: I wonder if this is not a knockoff from Stilla products? The one I received patina 03. You can never pull the wand out and not have the sponge applicator completely too saturated with product. I have tried scraping it on the side of the tube, but that does not really help much. Very disappointed. I will from now on only order make up from the store.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this same color and name from their store ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this same color and name from their store for years. I ordered it from amazon and the name is the same, however the color is different, it's lighter.
customer_reviews.author: R. nyc

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Safety seal missing!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! Product arrived without safety seal on cardboard packaging or lipgloss. There is no way to know if it has been used before, which is especially dangerous during a pandemic. I do not feel comfortable using an open lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color suggested is misleading... otherwise good product
customer_reviews.text: I have a different color that I love.. but this color is waaayyy brighter than the sales pictures suggests. I have to only use a tiny dab and then mute it with another color to tone it down.
customer_reviews.author: Lunahbella

customer_reviews.title: Best 💄 out there! 🙌
customer_reviews.text: 🙌 Amazing lipstick. All the stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️. I'm only buying this lipstick from now on. She does me right. She stays on ALL DAY. Doesn't flake! Coffee, lunch, dinner, wine, STILL THERE! I'm buying more colors. Who am I kidding-I'm buying like ALL the flipping colors. I have a picture of me in Patina-IT'S AFTER SEVEN HOURS OF WEAR including food and drink. 💜💜💜💜
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Pricy for what you get. It does stay on a little while longer but is very dry.
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it really dries out your lips so I need to put a clear gloss over it or my lips look chapped. As for the color, it’s nice. It does not stay on all day, I can tell you that much. It comes off when you eat also.
customer_reviews.author: Metal Raven Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: - Stays on even through food (might need a light touch up afterwards) - Easy to apply - Smells nice - Covers up slightly ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Stays on even through food (might need a light touch up afterwards) - Easy to apply - Smells nice - Covers up slightly chapped lips Cons: - None, this is my go-to lipstick
customer_reviews.author: Moosy

product_meta.title: Stay All Day Liquid Lipstick
product_meta.description:
Color:PatinaA full coverage creamy lipstick matte, delivers intense moisture with bold, long-lasting color and stays in place for up to 6 hours of continuous wear. The texture is weightless on lips and delivers superb comfort and its color-rich formula will not bleed or transfer. Enriched with vitamin e and avocado oil, this matte liquid lipstick hydrates and softens the lips so they look and feel beautiful. Eight new shades join two existing shades with new and improved plush doe foot applicator. Stila's Stay All Day matte lips include shades ranging from nude lipstick to red lipstick.

BRAND STORY
Artistry meets innovation, with a modern chic that translates from the runway to real life. For over 20 years, Stila has been inspiring fashion and creating products that perform as promised, lasting from morning to moonlight.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
